content.body:
Buckets is open source and managed by a community of makers on Assembly. By contributing to Buckets development, designers and developers also earn a portion of its profit. [Learn more »](https://assembly.com/buckets) 

## Contributing

This is a product being built by the Assembly community. You can help push this idea forward by visiting https://assemblymade.com/buckets. We welcome any contributions to product design/direction or code.
